translations: n．砂砾，碎石：由多个小石头组成的松散石子，通常用于铺设道路、铁路轨道等。
· The road was covered with gravels.

sentences.sentence: The Pleistocene superficial geology comprises well-bedded sandy gravels with occasional thin beds of sand.
sentences.translation: 更新世浅层地质为层状砂质砾石，偶有细沙层。

sentences.sentence: After completion of whole basic setup; I'd decided to make gravels.
sentences.translation: 经过整个基础设置完成后，我决定开始制作砾石。

sentences.sentence: Then he started weeping till his tears wetted the gravels of the ground.
sentences.translation: 然后，他开始哭泣，直至他的眼泪浸湿了砾石的地面。
